revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Iron Ruins |image = [[File:Iron Ruins.png|thumb]] |caption = A map of Iron Ruins. |tokens = 1,920,000 |location = Northwest of Giants Bed }} '''Iron Ruins''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Galar]]. It initially has 125 tiles arranged in two floors: 10x10 and 6x6 in size, respectively; including 16 chest tiles, 38 non-boss encounter tiles, 1 ladder tile, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 31,507,840 HP.
== Encounter Tables ==
===Wild Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Bronzong.png|40px]] Bronzong|| rowspan=8 colspan=2|<center>N/A |- | [[File:Duraludon.png|40px]] Duraludon |- | [[File:Copperajah.png|40px]] Copperajah |- | [[File:Corviknight.png|40px]] Corviknight |- | [[File:Perrserker.png|40px]] Perrserker |- | [[File:Bisharp.png|40px]] Bisharp |- | [[File:Ferrothorn.png|40px]] Ferrothorn |- | [[File:Excadrill.png|40px]] Excadrill |}

'''*Note:''' Must have made progress in [[Questlines#The_Ancient_Golems|The Ancient Golems]] Questline to unlock.
